thread.title: Coincheck sheds light on cryptocurrency theft

title: Coincheck sheds light on cryptocurrency theft
text:
Coincheck sheds light on cryptocurrency theft 12:50pm EST - 01:37 
Japanese cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck submits to regulators a report over last month's $530 million cryptocurrency theft and proposes security measures that it thinks will protect it against a repeat. Silvia Antonioli reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Japanese cryptocurrency exchange Coincheck submits to regulators a report over last month's $530 million cryptocurrency theft and proposes security measures that it thinks will protect it against a repeat. Silvia Antonioli reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2suJSOy
